Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Westin Grand, Berlin, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, steps from Komische Oper Berlin and Galeries Lafayette. This 5-star hotel is close to Brandenburg Gate and Checkpoint Charlie Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 400 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, hair dryers, and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional amenities at this Beaux Arts hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has 10764 square feet (1000 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, hair dryers, and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

With a stay at The Westin Grand, Berlin, you'll be centrally located in Berlin, steps from Komische Oper Berlin and Galeries Lafayette. This 5-star hotel is close to Brandenburg Gate and Checkpoint Charlie Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Komische Oper Berlin - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Galeries Lafayette - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
German Guggenheim - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
French Cathedral - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Konzerthaus Berlin - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Humboldt University - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Gendarmenmarkt - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Emil Nolde Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Bebelplatz - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
St. Hedwig's Cathedral - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
German Cathedral - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Berlin State Opera - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Madame Tussauds - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Neue Wache - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
German Historical Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 16.3 km / 10.1 mi

The preferred airport for The Westin Grand, Berlin is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
